title: Distracting Strike
content:
ur allies Advantage on their next Attack Roll against the target.

How to unlock Distracting Strike

Distracting Strike can be acquired by:

Lvl 3 Battle Master (Fighter Subclass) Martial Adept (Feat) grants this feature.
